title: Krzywe Karty
description: Multiplayer strategic card game where player can choose their own deck and play against each other.
The game is based on a board game developed by my friend.

title: Andromeda
short_description: A prototype of an Action-Adventure RPG game
description: The game me & my friends developed during our last semester at university of Wroclaw.
Our goal was to make a prototype of an Action-Adventure RPG for the narrative we came up with (watch the video).
We had a lot of fun working on it, and we learned a lot about game development and project management.
Me personally, were responsible for the coordination of the project, as well as the programming most important parts of the game.

title: Coco Jumpo
description: A game developed during Hackathon 2020 with my friends. We had 48 hours to create this game.
We were inspired by the game of our childhood - IcyTower.
I was responsible for developing the levels and programming procedural generation of the platforms.

title: Procedural terrain generator
short_description: A tool for procedural terrain generation in Unreal Engine
description: Tool for procedural terrain generation in UE5 developed as a part of my engineer degree.
Works for Unreal's built-in Landscape actor by attaching a component to it and adding special Terrain Modifier.
There are two built-in modifiers: Perlin Noise and Radial-FadeOut.
I used them both to create an island visible on the screenshot.
